bilingual.source: It has the worst service in town.

bilingual.target: 这家餐馆提供外卖服务。

bilingual.source: It became too expensive to continue the service.
bilingual.target: 继续提供服务变得太昂贵了。

bilingual.source: The food at the restaurant was quite good, but the service was terrible.
bilingual.target: 餐厅的食物很好，但服务很糟糕。

bilingual.source: Many cities in the world have their own special railway service.
bilingual.target: 世界上许多城市都有自己的特殊铁路服务。

bilingual.source: The service staff at the hotel provided excellent service.
bilingual.target: 酒店的服务人员提供了优质的服务。

bilingual.source: The waiter was apologetic for the delay in service.
bilingual.target: 服务员对服务的延迟感到表示歉意的。

bilingual.source: This service center offers a variety of customer services.
bilingual.target: 这个服务中心提供多种客户服务。

list.abstract: Service，英语单词，名词、形容词、及物动词，作名词时意为“服务，服侍；服役；仪式”。作及物动词时意为“维修，检修；保养”。作形容词时意为“服务性的；耐用的；服现役的”。
《Service》是韩国女子组合VIVIDIVA演唱的一首歌曲 ，由李世焕、林东贤作词、作曲。该曲收录在单曲专辑《Service》中，于2015年9月15日发行。

yingyinNormal.en: By the way, great service today. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对了，今天的优秀服务员，没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Mummy sheep's car has broken down. Granddad dog's breakdown service!
yingyinNormal.zh: 羊妈妈的车坏了。狗爷爷故障服务！

yingyinNormal.en: Granddad dog's breakdown service!
yingyinNormal.zh: 狗爷爷故障服务！

yingyinNormal.en: You supply a service. Yes. Traditionally, higher education is a product marketed only to the elite.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是在提供服务。是的，传统意义上，高等教育是一项只为精英人群服务的产品。

yingyinNormal.en: Our service mission here was supposed to last for 31 Sols.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们在这儿的服务设施只用来维持31太阳日。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey! Room service. oh. oh, no, no, no, no, sir. You have the wrong room.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好！客房服务。不，不，不，先生，你一定搞错房间了。

yingyinNormal.en: Service call. Just like I taught her. She's going undercover as the cable guy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通过服务电话 跟我教她的一样，她伪装成送货的混进去

yingyinNormal.en: Thanks. Clearly this is a very, very hard time for you, but, we provided a service, and we deserve to be paid because you ate that service.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢了，你现在当然十分难过，但我们提供服务就该领到费用，因为你吃都吃了。

yingyinNormal.en: Alright. Well, how long will it take to free swim from the intake to the service hatch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，从进水口自由潜泳到服务舱门需要多长时间。

yingyinNormal.en: So you were not being paid under his all-service contract at that point?
yingyinNormal.zh: 也就是说，根据全面服务合同，这个时间点你并没有获得报酬，对吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Is this a service you're providing me? No. No. No. For my new fridge, our new fridge.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要提供某种服务吗？不是，是我要买冰箱，我们要买冰箱。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, men. Gather 'round. Teachable moment. Don't think of community service as a requirement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，各位，都过来，教学时间，不要把社区服务当成一种要求。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you. You know, I can buy all these things online. I come here for the personal service.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢。你知道我本可以在网上买这些的，我来这是为了个性化服务的。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, can we chop the tree down? No. We'll have to call the highest rescue service in the land.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在我们可以把树砍到了吗？不行，看来我们只有找本地最高级的救援服务了。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, you probably can't read, fox, but the sign says we reserve the right to refuse service to anyone! So beat it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是不识字吗，狐狸，看这个，我们有权拒绝提供服务，快走吧。

yingyinNormal.en: And we'll order room service before. That way we will finish our loud adult shower sex just as room service arrives and we will slip on robes and eat burgers. No, wait spaghetti. No, I like burgers better. We will eat burgers in bed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在此之前我们得先叫客房服务。这样一来，在结束成人式淋浴放荡性爱后，正好来客房服务，。我们就可以穿着浴袍啃汉堡，不，慢着，意大利面。不，我还是喜欢汉堡。我们要躺在床上啃汉堡。

yingyinNormal.en: Jane, I work for a new organization seeking young women, like yourself, to train in a career in government service.
yingyinNormal.zh: 简，我为一个新组织工作，在寻找像你这样的年轻女士培训后为政府服务。

yingyinNormal.en: Here is Abdul with drinks. If there is anything you need please do not hesitate to ask. We are at your service.
yingyinNormal.zh: 阿卜杜勒为您端来了饮品，如果您有其他需要请务必告知我，我们随时为您服务。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you them? We are members of the Abagail Adams Society of Intellectual Advancement. How may we be of service?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们是吗？我们是阿比盖尔·亚当斯高智商社团的成员，有什么能为你们服务的？

yingyinNormal.en: Strawberry. Oh, it's melted. How about ice-cream soup, instead? Granddad Dog's breakdown service.
yingyinNormal.zh: 草莓在这，哦，怎么都化了呢，要不然，给你来个冰淇淋汤怎么样。这里是狗爷爷维修服务电话。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 服务；公共服务体系；系统的运行；宗教仪式；成套餐具；发球；正式送达；售后服务；帮助；协助；军队
n. 佣人；仆人；公务员；政府的雇员；热心追随者
n. 一客；一份

word_family.mean: v. 为（人；机构）服务；供应；上；送达；实现；满足；发球；卷缠；操作；够

examination_example.sentence: At the same time, the European Union, Spain, Britain and several other countries have all seriously contemplated digital <highlight>services</highlight> taxes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，欧盟、西班牙、英国和其他几个国家都在认真考虑征收数字服务税。

examination_example.sentence: During the decade before the economic crisis, spending on legal <highlight>services</highlight> in America grew twice as fast as inflation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在经济危机之前的十年间，美国法律服务支出的增长速度是通货膨胀的两倍。

examination_example.sentence: There will always be change — new jobs, new products, new <highlight>services</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总会有变化——新工作、新产品、新服务。

sense_info_list.en: a public department or organization run by the state

examination_example.sentence: Now comes word that everyone involved — Democrats, Republicans, the Postal <highlight>Service</highlight> — has finally agreed on a plan to fix the system.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在有消息称，所有相关人员——民主党人、共和党人、邮政部门——终于就修复该系统的计划达成一致。

examination_example.sentence: This is why repeated attempts at reform legislation have failed in recent years, leaving the Postal <highlight>Service</highlight> unable to pay its bills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是为什么近年来改革立法的多次尝试都以失败告终，导致邮政部门无法支付账单的原因。

examination_example.sentence: In 2015, the US Forest <highlight>Service</highlight> for the first time spent more than half of its $5.5 billion annual budget fighting fires.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2015年，美国国家森林局首次将其55亿美元年度预算的一半以上用于灭火。

sense_info_list.en: make payments to pay back a debt
a set of objects used in providing and eating food
the act of hitting the ball to the other player to start play
a formal religious ceremony
the use which can be made of a machine
an act of help or assistance
examine a machine and repair any damaged parts
the act of delivering a writ or summons upon someone
the act of mating by male animals
the armed forces

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 自助的；自选的；自动售货的；自己操作的
n. 服务；公共服务体系；系统的运行；宗教仪式；成套餐具；发球；正式送达；售后服务；帮助；协助；军队
n. 佣人；仆人；公务员；政府的雇员；热心追随者
n. 一客；一份

word_family.mean: v. 为（人；机构）服务；供应；上；送达；实现；满足；发球；卷缠；操作；够

sense_info_list.en: the performance of duties by a waiter or servant

examination_example.sentence: Despite the abundance of financial products, <highlight>services</highlight> and solutions geared towards accumulating wealth, if all begins with the same equation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管有大量的金融产品、服务和解决方案旨在积累财富，但如果一切都从同一个等式开始。

examination_example.sentence: There is no reason why visitors to the UK on holiday in hotspots, should be exempt from taxation—particularly when vital local <highlight>services</highlight> including waste collection.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有理由让在热点地区度假的英国游客免税——尤其是在包括垃圾收集在内的重要地方服务方面。

examination_example.sentence: They don't seem to mind paying for additional <highlight>services</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们似乎不介意为额外服务付费。

sense_info_list.en: a company or agency that performs a public service; subject to government regulation
sense_info_list.zh: 公用部门; 政府部门

examination_example.sentence: Both international and domestic visitors in the UK should pay tourist tax so as to ease its financial burden of providing local <highlight>services</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国的国际和国内游客都应该缴纳旅游税，以减轻其提供本地服务的财政负担。

examination_example.sentence: But as the emergency <highlight>services</highlight> picked through the burnt debris, a row was resurfacing over accusations that the beloved cathedral.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是当紧急服务人员在烧焦的废墟中搜寻时，一场关于这座受人爱戴的大教堂的指责重新浮出水面。

examination_example.sentence: Police and fire <highlight>services</highlight> will spend the next 48 hours assessing the "security and safety" of the 850-year-old structure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 警察和消防部门将在接下来的48小时内评估这座有850年历史的建筑的“安保和安全”。

sense_info_list.en: a facility supplying some public demand; a facility providing maintenance and repair
an act of help or assistance
the armed forces
a formal religious ceremony
the act of delivering a writ or summons upon someone
an amount of money charged for serving a customer in a restaurant, often paid directly to the waiter

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 服务；公共服务体系；系统的运行；宗教仪式；成套餐具；发球；正式送达；售后服务；帮助；协助；军队
n. 提供服务者；服务员；计算机网络服务器；发球者；服务生；弥撒中的助祭
n. 佣人；仆人；公务员；政府的雇员；热心追随者
n. 一客；一份

word_family.mean: v. 为（人；机构）服务；供应；上；送达；实现；满足；发球；卷缠；操作；够

sense_info_list.en: the performance of duties by a waiter or servant

examination_example.sentence: What is the root cause of the poor <highlight>service</highlight> at British airport according to the British Airport Authority?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据英国机场管理局，英国机场糟糕服务的根本原因是什么？

examination_example.sentence: Whether the Spanish company could offer better <highlight>service</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 西班牙公司能否提供更好的服务。

examination_example.sentence: At an airline transfer <highlight>service</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在航空公司的转机服务站。

sense_info_list.en: a company or agency that performs a public service; subject to government regulation
sense_info_list.zh: 公用部门; 政府部门

examination_example.sentence: Schools see young people more than any other <highlight>service</highlight>, which gives them a unique ability get to children and young people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学校比其他任何公共部门都更多地关注年轻人，这给了他们一种独特的能力去接触孩子和年轻人。

examination_example.sentence: Teachers often cite a lack of training, expertise and support from the National Health <highlight>Service</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教师们经常提到缺乏来自英国国家医疗服务体系的培训、专业知识和支持。

sense_info_list.en: an act of help or assistance

examination_example.sentence: The notion that as parents we need to schedule every minute of their time is not doing them a great <highlight>service</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为父母，我们需要安排他们每一分钟的时间，这种观念并没有给他们带来很大的帮助。

sense_info_list.en: the armed forces

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

n. 佣人；仆人；公务员；政府的雇员；热心追随者
n. 一客；一份

word_family.mean: v. 为（人；机构）服务；供应；上；送达；实现；满足；发球；卷缠；操作；够

sense_info_list.en: the performance of duties by a waiter or servant

examination_example.sentence: Pruitt is certainly providing a <highlight>service</highlight>, but it's not just the bikes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 普鲁特当然提供服务，但不仅仅是自行车。

examination_example.sentence: Many would say the Internet is a place for people who have given up on the traditional postal <highlight>service</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人会说互联网是那些放弃传统邮政服务的人的地方。

examination_example.sentence: She encouraged a sense of community (社区) by creating shelters and promoting education and <highlight>services</highlight> for people in need.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她通过为有需要的人建立庇护所和促进教育和服务来鼓励社区意识。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, "行为, 状态"

exam_freq_info.chinese: 服务; 服务企业/业务

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 自助的；自选的；自动售货的；自己操作的
n. 服务；公共服务体系；系统的运行；宗教仪式；成套餐具；发球；正式送达；售后服务；帮助；协助；军队
n. 提供服务者；服务员；计算机网络服务器；发球者；服务生；弥撒中的助祭
n. 佣人；仆人；公务员；政府的雇员；热心追随者
n. 一客；一份

word_family.mean: v. 为（人；机构）服务；供应；上；送达；实现；满足；发球；卷缠；操作；够

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 社区志愿工作；社区志愿服务；社会服务
食品服务；饮食服务；餐饮服务

sense_info_list.zh: 服务; 服务企业/业务

examination_example.sentence: It's the first self-<highlight>service</highlight> bank in China.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是中国第一家自助银行。

examination_example.sentence: We hope we can give you better <highlight>service</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们希望能为您提供更好的服务。

examination_example.sentence: They were quite thankful for the waiter's <highlight>service</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们非常感谢服务员的服务。

examination_example.sentence: Many public <highlight>service</highlight> ads on TV remind us to spend more time getting on / along with (与…… 相处) our parents well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电视上的很多公益广告都提醒我们要多花时间与父母好好相处。

examination_example.sentence: Every home there will have a "telepresence system (远程遥控系统) "—allowing users to control the heating and locks, take part in video meetings, and receive education, health care and government <highlight>services</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那里的每个家庭都会有一个“远程遥控系统”——让用户可以控制暖气和门锁，参加视频会议，接受教育、医疗保健和政府服务。

examination_example.sentence: Government <highlight>Services</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 政府服务体系

sense_info_list.en: an act of help or assistance

examination_example.sentence: Thank you so much for the <highlight>service</highlight> that you do in saving people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 非常感谢你在救人方面所提供的服务。

examination_example.sentence: The six-year-old boy breaks windows and runs away, so that Chaplin's character can offer his <highlight>services</highlight> as a window fixer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个六岁的男孩打破窗户逃跑了，这样卓别林的角色就可以提供窗户修理工的服务。

examination_example.sentence: For their great <highlight>service</highlight>, we shouldn't forget these animals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为它们的巨大帮助，我们不应该忘记这些动物。

word_usage.usage: service表示“（饭店、旅馆等的）服务情况”时为抽象名词，不可数。
